website_summaries.verdict: Long lasting pumice stone with ergonomic shape that is comfortable to use and exfoliates skin with ease.
pros: Includes convenient hanging rope loop to store away when not in use
A good size that fits in to your palm, giving you control for pumice pressure
cons: Some users received stones damaged in transit, manufacturer could use better shipping packaging

customer_reviews.title: A useless rock
customer_reviews.text: The stone I received was not at all porous like the one in the photo. It’s basically a smooth rock and a tiny corner has a porous peice that could actually be used as a pumice stone. There other 90% is super smooth which is useless
customer_reviews.author: Nenne Jane

customer_reviews.title: The worst purchase I have ever made on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The worst purchase I have ever made on Amazon. Looks like nothing as advertised. Only maybe 25% of the total surface was porous, rest is smooth and friable and overall useless. It also came in two pieces...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best, Best, Best Pumice Stone
customer_reviews.text: Finally - I don't have to buy any type of exfoliator (cream or liquid) that claims to remove dead skin. This lava stone does. And another thing ... how many times over a few decades did I buy "pumice stones" that looked like bricks, were light in color and did nothing to remove dead skin from my feet? Now that I have this brown nubby rock, I don't have to buy anything else. Just soak your feet and rub them with the pumice stone to remove dead skin. Be careful not to rub too hard or you could chafe your skin. Follow up with a good, natural oil or cream as an emollient.
customer_reviews.author: mmctec

customer_reviews.title: best foot scrubber/exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foot scrubber/exfoliator I've ever owned. I think it will probably last forever. I get really dry skin on my feet and my heels get scratchy (ew), so I use this at the end of every shower and the problem is solved! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Not as porous as pictured, smooth on many parts, cracked chunk missing. It did smooth out my feet and the pores are a bit more prominent after my first use, but overall disappointed. I had to work really hard to smooth out my calluses and barely did a good job.
customer_reviews.author: James pierre perdue iii

customer_reviews.title: Smooth stone
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review after coming back to order a different product. Like many others here, I received an essentially smooth stone. There is one little patch on it that actually has some pumice capability, but it's very awkward to get it where I need to on my feet. The stone is smooth all over, I could rub it all over my baby's skin and it wouldn't hurt him. Doesn't do a thing for my feet. I went and ordered a proper pumice scrubber. This is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Evans

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I had dry, cracked heels on my feet. Have used other products in the past with only okay results. This was amazing and made my feet unbelievably soft with just the first use! I will continue to use and definitely purchasing again in the future and for friends! Be sure to get the rock wet and the area you want to use. let it soak first then use. the only issue with this product is it needs some instructions perhaps.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and worthless
customer_reviews.text: Too smooth to do anything useful, rubbing it is basically the equivalent of a dry towel on your foot. It looks good in photos, but is mostly a useless gimmick. Look elsewhere, it better yet in person where you can feel the texture instead of being manipulated by fake/paid Amazon reviews.
customer_reviews.author: ian

customer_reviews.title: Came gross!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product came open with red residue all over it. Looks like its been sitting in a storage container smashed under stuff for a few years. GROSS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ambi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: The convex shape fits well in your hand but does not work well for smoothing feet. Very little contact. We prefer the flat ones
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I bought a rock and I couldn't love it more!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It works extremely well on my feet. Heels and pads. I have been using it for a couple of weeks now at the end of my shower (giving my feet time to soak). I do use these little gel healing socks after but with the combination of using the pumice stone and the socks, my feet have been so soft lately. I've actually started using the stone on other areas of my body that tend to need a little exfoliation. Backs if my arms and my upper thighs. I do rub the stone very gently on my arms and legs and go in circular motions. It's done wonders those places too! Do recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help with the Calais build up on my feet that were starting to crack and hurt. I used it after showering a little at a time because it very quickly removed the build up and I didnt want to sand my foot down to raw skin! We do alot of barefoot walking and hiking and so far its helped a ton! Just a forewarning, when its wet it definitely makes a funny sound, because of all the air pockets, when your using it!
customer_reviews.author: keara estrada

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I had really bad calluses on my feet. Soaked my feet for 5 minutes first then worked in a circular motion. Did not get it all the first time but after the second time my calluses were gone. Much better than the grater I have.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Blevins

customer_reviews.title: This works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: This works like a dream! Reminds me of the pumice stone my mom had when I was growing up, it peels all the dead skin off without hurting the foot. I wouldn't say it is immediate if you have rough feet, but with continued use after 3-4 days, this worked very well. I would not recommend scrubbing too hard on the first day as you may hurt yourself.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but effective
customer_reviews.text: I have used the stone a couple of times and it has worked well! I've never had a pumice stone before, so I wasn't sure what to expect. The size is large, it takes up most of the palm of my hand. It is gentle but does the job of sloughing off the unwanted toughened skin. I used it in the shower so the skin would be softer and my feet look and feel nicer. I'm very happy with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Runners Feet
customer_reviews.text: I've never actually used a pumice stone before. I've always had calluses on the balls of my feet from running, but I noticed last winter that my heels were really dry as well. I usually get pedicures, but those get expensive, and I never do them in winter when my skin is the most dry. A friend of mine told me how awesome pumice stones are so I decided to try this one after reading the reviews. I am very pleased! Instant results in terms of smoothing out my skin. The calluses will take awhile to disappear, but they are definitely smoother, and I'm confident with regular use, they will go away too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie R. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: The gentle and effective pet rock (on a rope).
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that simply is exactly as advertised- A natural pumice stone with a rope through it. It can hang in the shower/bath when you’re not using it, it fits in your hand comfortably, and it works great to remove the dead skin without being too harsh. I don’t have before/after pictures of my used-to-be cracked heels and feet, but after a few uses of this pumice stone in the shower, My feet are beginning to feel soft again. I really like this approach instead of harsher rasps and files, which are too easy to overdo and leave irritated skin. This is a gentle yet effective product- my new pet rock.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Take it easy with this stone because it’s not playing. It will remove some skin!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used my stone only once but my goodness what a difference from the usual gray ones. This guy is a stout stone that fits nicely in the palm of your hand and will take off lotsa dead skin! I’ve called my feet hooves for years because of my ugly heels but now I’m beginning to think they might become feet again!😂 I would recommend this pumice stone HIGHLY! Finally one that WORKS! Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: but it has an actual "rock" like you'd find on a gravel road or in your ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't impressed. There is a dang rock stuck in the one you sent. Yes, I know the whole thing is rock, but it has an actual "rock" like you'd find on a gravel road or in your back yard in it. I'm sure this is just a mistake, but seriously - where is your quality control! Sure won't buy this again...that way there won't be any unnecessary ROCKS in my ROCK!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Not completely as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The pores on the rock in photo look nice and large, which is what made me purchase it. The rock I got had miniscule pores, like the regular cheap kind that does nothing. I know it probably wasn’t going to be EXACTLY the same, but I didn’t expect that level of difference. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: Thank God for much needed relief that came from this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using pumice stones, creams - you name it - trying to get my feet cleared up from some over scabbing. Been fighting this for months. After one use (and people I am dead serious) ONE USE - the scabbing it mostly gone. My feet aren’t itching and I’m so grateful. I was hesitant as I’ve spent so much money trying to get relief. Much easier to grasp and use and the effect is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Lori S

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything for me.
customer_reviews.text: Reviews said to go easy on your feet, so I did... and nothing happened. Then I tried going harder to remove some skin, and nothing happened. This was done at the end of the shower so my feet were nice and soft, but it didn't work or really remove anything.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely disappointed in this purchase. From some reviews and the item picture posted, I expected this to be porous. Maybe I just received a bad rock but mine was only porous in an area the size of 2 quarters. I'm really really bummed as I bought one expecting to love it and then buy one for all of my siblings. Please do not waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sabina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pumice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for over a year it’s by far the best pumice I’ve ever had. I use it after I leave the nail salon because it makes my feet softer than the one they use at the salon! My feet feel like silk!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamika H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Once I received the pumice stone I searched the internet to see the Best way to use it. Soak your foot or area on your body in water for about 5-10 minutes along with the stone. It definitely removes dry/dead skin, however, the callous I have is deep inside. My foot does feel better. The Only improvement I would make with this product is: "How to Use it"
customer_reviews.author: skeywest

customer_reviews.title: It smoothes out those rough spots for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I received a good one. It smoothed out the rough parts on the bottom and top of my feet. Often times when we get our toes done they neglect the top part of our toes only focusing on the bottom of our feet. I was finally able to smooth out the rough spots that were always overlooked. I will reorder next time. I love this pumice.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Relief after one use!
customer_reviews.text: After the ped-egg and Salon cheese graters being used on my heels, they were in pretty bad shape. After one use, I had the relief I’ve been searching for! I will continue to use this to get my feet back in shape. Doesn’t seem to moisturize as stated, however thats minor in comparison to the relief it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Coco amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Even my pedicurist was impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This stone makes your shower like a mini-pedi session of your very own. My feet are not only soft, they aren't cracked or dry-looking. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: MBvR

customer_reviews.title: High quality, works great
customer_reviews.text: High quality and works great. It’s also pretty, so I leave it out on the counter. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is that I found it to be a little hard to hold while I’m using it. I have pretty big hands for a woman, and I found it to be just a little bigger than I could comfortably grip. It came with excellent instructions, and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders on tired chef feet!
customer_reviews.text: As a chef, I'm on my feet 12+ hours a day 6 days a week. While my Crocs do a good job of keeping foot pain away, they make the outside of my heels form thick calluses. Now that winter is here, they are starting to really dry out and crack becoming very painful. I soaked my feet for five minutes while simultaneously soaking the pumice stone. The stone made quick work of my calluses! I was intimidated at first my the size of the pores on the stone, but they easily sloughed off all the built up dead skin on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Romano

customer_reviews.title: Maybe ok?
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended as this product is not better than others in my local drug/cosmetic store shelves & costs more. FYI: Made in china, non-returnable product
customer_reviews.author: Red pet

customer_reviews.title: Smooth after one use!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This worked so much better than I anticipated. My heels aren’t the worst, but they were certainly scratchy enough that I was embarrassed of them. There was noticeable improvement after the first use! I’ve been using it for over a week now and my feet are sooooo much softer. Totally worth the purchase. Also- great customer service. Got an email with instructions which I thought was great.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pumice stone I’ve used in my 26 years on this earth. I’m really picky and stopped using the cheap ones from Walmart because I did not feel like they did anything. This is wonderful and scrubbed
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: I'm A Fan
customer_reviews.text: I use it either in the shower or immediately after. Removes dead skin from feet. I did drop it and now have 2 pieces. Even better! I have 1 for each bathroom. I've also used it on the backs of my arms (gently) better than scrubs with plastic beads - better for the environment.
customer_reviews.author: cooking

customer_reviews.title: Good pumice stone
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a pumice stone to work down the calluses on my hands from lifting weights. This product works. It’s not great but it works. However, I was annoyed when I opened the package and a fine red dust went all over my counter top but it is what it is. Seems to be doing the job so far though.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Forseth

customer_reviews.title: I love this pumice stone!
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 would recommend! It's a great size in my hand, and it's easy to grip (so if I add soap or something it doesn't slip out of my hand). It's got a little rope attached to it so I can hang it up to dry and it doesn't sit and get gross in my shower. It's firm enough that it takes off all of the dead skin from my feet, smoothes the cracks in my heels, and doesn't take a lot of effort to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robin E R Hurwitz

customer_reviews.title: Great stone for feet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thus pumice stone is amazing! I have had a callous on the outside of my big toe for a while. I have been using this stone every night on the callous and my heels. I have seen such an improvement! Heels are much softer and my callous has gone down and is smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Not so easy to use on my feet though, which is what I bought it for. Not horrible, but also not the greatest. Meh
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it at all.  Tossed it after giving it a few chances.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like this at all. Someone recommended it to me, so I bought it for my rough, dry heels. It did nothing for my feet. The sandpaper style foot scrubbers are much better and far more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Smooth feet without spending a fortune in a Salon
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many pumice stones but this natural lava stone is the best. It doesn't hurt, my heels and feet entirety are smooth. Better than after leaving the nail salon & having spent a fortune. I purchased 2 one for my daughter and one for my self. She said she was very happy. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Much better than store stones
customer_reviews.text: Really worth to buy. I spent like 20 seconds with this stone and with store stones usually it takes about 2-3 minutes for steps
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Wow- It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! It’s super porous and easy to hold. It fits great in the palm of my hand and in all the grooves and curves of my feet. It’s a very hard so it scrapes the calluses smooth but not so hard that it scratches the soft part of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Loveless

customer_reviews.title: Works greats
customer_reviews.text: It works so good on my feet. My boyfriend has a foot fetish and it keeps my heels and ankles super soft. It really is amazing. Gets all the dead skin off. Also worked wonders on dark skin spots. I have darkened armpits and knees. And they are significantly lighter using this. I think it scrapes the build up of oils/deodorants off ever so slightly over time that it just lightens.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PUMICE STONE = HAPPY FEET!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful transaction with a very pleasant seller. My dog ate my old pumice stone and my feet demanded a new one. Don't worry, he's after it again in the photo, but I love it and he can't have this one! Its a very nice product. Even came in nice packaging. A++++++!
customer_reviews.author: Smudge's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for callous feet
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders! I’ve tried other brands and this is the best Pumice Stone for my rough feet.
customer_reviews.author: Cbazz

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality pumice. I know it looks daunting because of the darker color, but it does an excellent job. I use it on my whole body and feel refreshed. Its easy to use and hold. It really helps with calluses and scrubbing your feet, too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bellan

customer_reviews.title: Great Stone, Now Getting Another for My Son
customer_reviews.text: I've got 2 of these stones, they work great on the tough skin on my feet. My kids are in soccer and my oldest has this as well. Now my 11 year old wants this for his feet so I'm buying it again. It's just rough enough to do the job. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Woodchip

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend For Calluses
customer_reviews.text: This has worked out well. Soak my feet for about ten minutes (I do this separate from my showers), rub the affected areas for a minute or so and after a week or so there is much improvement. Would recommend for calluses.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Fake. Worst product you can possibly find.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing about this product is Natural. Man made, Chinese knock off that came broken and literally just keep chaffing, breaking, melting away with water contact. Does not do anything promised. I know, because I’ve been suffering from callus for over 25 years. Feels synthetic and cheap. Not sure if I want to put this on my skin. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: California Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this!! Must get!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I’m so glad I got it. It’s the perfect size. I’m a hairstylist and I wear heels everyday to work. I stand basically all day and I’ve gotten hard calluses on my feet. I’ve been using this pumice stone every day since I got it. I rub it on my callus in a circular motion while I’m taking a hot shower for about 2 mins each foot. That’s all it takes. Now they’re not so hard and noticeable!! I love this product and I’d recommend it to everyone. Fast shipping also! Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Lu

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Way better than a Ped Egg
customer_reviews.text: I got sick of the cheese grater that is a ped egg and decided to try a more natural way. I dont know how many times the ped egg slipped and cut my thumb. This is so much easier and safer. It also works better! I felt the ped egg made my skin tougher just causing more calluses. This pumice stone made my feet softer and smoother in one use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This pumice stone works well. It’s the perfect size and shape to hold easily while using. It dries quickly and does not leave any residue behind on surfaces which I was worried about. It’s not painful to use at all and it lasts for a while. I’ve been using about twice a week for about 4 months and it looks the same as it did when I bought it and still works as well.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy this given some of the reviews, but I did not have any of the issues mentioned in previous reviews. I love it! I was not disappointed at all. My feet feel smooth and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instant results for the man feet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I was developing nasty man feet as I age and the pumice stone is turning the tide. Visible results from Day 1. It feels sooo gooood too. Wish I had discovered it years ago!
customer_reviews.author: P. Waydo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Really like the size of this pumice stone and it isn’t incredibly rough. Definitely made my feet smooth after soaking my feet and using the pumice stone.
customer_reviews.author: peggy christensen

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for about 2 weeks now. Works great other than the little pieces that come off when using it. This is my first time using a pumice stone, so I’m not sure if that is supposed to happen. It definitely helps rid my feet of the dead skin. Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Harper

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Only used it for a week, light weight, easy to hold, seems to be doing its job, I had extremely dry heels, thought its not completely healed yet, I think with consistent use, my heals will be smooth like a baby bottom
customer_reviews.author: Danelle

customer_reviews.title: really works
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband, he has really dry feet, he has only used couple times, we've only had for a couple weeks. He can see the difference, it seems to really be helping his dry skin problem on his feet
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Feet are in the best shape of my life
customer_reviews.text: So I originally purchased this item during quarantine. Since I no longer can get pedicures for the time being this has been helpful. Now I don’t have full fledge Flinstone rough soles, but I do have some hyper pigmentation on the top of my foot that this has definitely helped with. In combination with a few other things this has been a miracle worker
customer_reviews.author: Ariel F.

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Natural Earth Lava Pumice Stone is exactly how it is described, and the instructions for using and maintaining it for long well are comprehensive and accurate. Thanks for asking.
customer_reviews.author: Kay D. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: really pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have extremely calloused feet, they're just a bit dry. This helps me feel like I have well pedicured feet - keeps them soft! My only concern is that residue might build up in the little pores. Otherwise I'm highly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McRee

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a pumice stone that is worth my time and money. The stone is quality, easy to hold and does a fantastic job. Great for yourself or to include in gift to someone else!
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: it's a rock
customer_reviews.text: Folks, I'm not complaining about this stone, but it is just a rock. It doesn't hurt when I rub on my feet, it is has knocked off a lot of dry skin and callous. it works, but it is a rock, nice to have a hole and string so you can hang, but folks it is a rock
customer_reviews.author: Karl Gartland

customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I haven’t been getting regular pedicures due to COVID restrictions so I was looking for something to do the job at home. Great pumice stone, not painful to use and does an awesome job! I would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have silky smooth feet now
customer_reviews.text: I've had pumice stones before and they tended to fall apart or be too rough, but I didn't have that problem with this one. It's functional and I can get pretty precise with the level of control without being too aggressive.
customer_reviews.author: Ashkan Kiani

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made. Solid and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hale

customer_reviews.title: Works okay but doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: This pumice works pretty well to reduce callouses. However, it didn’t last more than 4 months with once a week or so use. It also became very foul smelling even with regular rinses. Won’t buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Niccie

customer_reviews.title: A Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I Highly recommend this seller. This was exactly what I was looking for and I got what I expected. very fast shipping and I liked the price. My feet are smooth instead of ....well my feet needed some work, and this product did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Love

customer_reviews.title: Product was exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described and I highly recommend it. Some other reviews mentioned that the stone was much smoother than pictured but mine was very porous and rough. Perfectly removed callouses and dead skin on my feet. I followed the instructions of soaking for about 5 minutes first and it worked great. Thanks for a great and affordable product Ruby Naz and team!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a rock you rub on callouses
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold: 5/5, its a rock with a string. Moisturizing: 1/5, its a rock with a string. Easy to use: 5/5, its a rock with a string. There's not much to review. It does the exact purpose I intended it for. I get my feet wet and scrape off dead skin and callouses from being barefoot all the time. Sometimes simple is best. You're looking for a pumice stone? This is a pumice stone. $10 isn't a bad price.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: this is a wonderful pumice stone for your feet ( what we purchased it for) it beats those cheap ones from the store hands down. husband jumped in the shower as soon as we got it delivered and said his feet felt better afterwards. it looks as though its going to last a while too, very thick. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: jackie80

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: This really helped me get rid of my dry skin on my heels. It's perfectly useful, though don't put it on a clean white tub. It's definitely rock and a bit grimy. It cleans with a few washes though. It's nice, useful, and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea F

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results after one use!
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, I love this pumice stone - I have only used it once so far, but I already know using it a few more days is going to reveal amazing results. After all, just one use already provided amazing results. One thing I do not like, it’s made in China - that would be the only thing I would change.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C. Martin-Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. It’s a nice size and works SUPER well. Be careful not to scrub with too much pressure because this thing WORKS without too much force. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Stone!
customer_reviews.text: This was well worth the $! I've used Pumice stones before, but this one did the job in 1 go. 5 minutes and new smooth soles! I clean it with antibacterial soap and a toothbrush. And I'll boil it once a month. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: best pumice i've ever had
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't crumble like other pumice stones and it does the work on your callouses like it needs to do, looks like this will last forever, I love it
customer_reviews.author: R. Fried

customer_reviews.title: Get ittt
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for about a year. I boil it every few weeks to disinfect it. Husband loves it for his hands calluses. I love it for my feet. It fits well in your hand. Abrasive AF without being too much. Best one ive ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Shain =)

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Works great! See improvement in my feet after one or two uses.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P

customer_reviews.title: Too smooth to work.  Can't return
customer_reviews.text: This would not do anything for your feet...too smooth. Notice no refund in very small letters. Disappointed in no refund policy.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita L Brousseau

customer_reviews.title: 🎶I WANT TO ROCK!...ROCK!...I WANT TO...ROCK!🎶
customer_reviews.text: If you have a rock collection, this is a must buy. It cleaned all the dead skin from my heels. If you suffer from scaling, crack heels please put your feet between a rock and a hard place.
customer_reviews.author: The Wizard of Nothing

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, but tough
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it works. However, little tiny pieces seem to come off when using it. I had originally bought it to go with a foot care gift I bought for someone else, but decided to keep it for myself because it looked like a better one than the one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Dene

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My lava exfoliating rock arrived quickly and just as described/pictured. This works so good! It’s easy to hold and scrubs off dry skin and callus with ease. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Works well, doesn’t crumble
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s working as expected and I like that it doesn’t crumble. It’s nice that it has a little rope attached to hang it up. It fits in your hand well (I have medium sized hands)
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I some how got calluses on my thumbs, probably from all of the amazon reviews I do...kidding! This item helped with these weird calluses and I didn’t notice the smell people mentioned after a few days of use. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Use it on my little feet that have taken a beating over the last year or so. Had a couple calluses forming on one of my feet but this is really working.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee from Philly

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stone. I keep it in the shower and use it 2 or 3 times a week to keep my heels smooth and soft. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine.
customer_reviews.text: Not magical, but it works much like any other pumice stone I’ve used. No issues with excessive crumbling or anything like other reviews have stated.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Too smooth.
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and not nearly as porous as pictured. You have to scrub real hard to get dead skin off and in my case I ended up also scrubbing off a little healthy skin near the area I was trying to focus on so I had to stop using it. Also, for some reason, they put an insane amount of dye in this thing. Don't open it over anything you care about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Removed my corns
customer_reviews.text: I had two corns on my foot and I was using corn removers. Once I received the stone I used it after a hot shower and it immediately smoothed out my foot
customer_reviews.author: joseph t. grappone jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This pumice stone works great! I soaked my feet in hot water for about 5 minutes before scrubbing it along my heels and the dead, dry skin practically fell off. My feet are going to stay baby soft all summer long thanks to this product!
customer_reviews.author: Neal H.

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome! Every other pumice stone I bought from stores do absolutely nothing. But this is the real deal. Literally after soaking my foot in epson salt and using this natural lava pumice stone my skin calluses were coming off with little effort. I should have bought more to give to relatives as gifts it is that good. A foot saver
customer_reviews.author: Dorette Wade

customer_reviews.title: functional, works great
customer_reviews.text: I use for filing down hand callus from weight lifting, on my weekly sauna visit. Works great. Left my prior stone at the gym, did not hesitate to reorder the same product.
customer_reviews.author: pete ashley

customer_reviews.title: ehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: this doesn't really work for me. I have to use another pumice that id finer to really get smooth feet. do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dorota E. Kopacz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really love how it feels on my feet and when I’m taking a shower something I like to use it on my back to scratch a spot
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Caley

customer_reviews.title: Great stone
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to hold, dries quickly, came with care instructions which is important for control of bacteria with a product that gets wet intermittently. I'm glad I purchased this stone. It did the job!
customer_reviews.author: Seyda Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is the real deal. I think every other pumice stone I've had was a fake. This looks like it was just pulled out of the ground. It is a little rough, so you have to be more careful, but boy does it work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura and Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Takes the dry sweat off my feet after a whole day with closed shoes at the office. Leaves foot skin soft after continuous use. I boil it every week to preventing the dead skin cells and dirt off my feet to stick to it and making it smell badly. I like it
customer_reviews.author: Juan J Mejia-Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Love My Rock
customer_reviews.text: I have a very bad athlete's foot infection where the skin on my feet crack, peel and flake. This rock helps a lot sloughing off the dead skin that a regular wash cloth can't. VERY abrasive. Get this with a very high quality foot moisturizer and you're good to go
customer_reviews.author: Shaunie

customer_reviews.title: A nifty item to have in the household!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been on the fence on whether to purchase this product or not, but I'm glad I settled on doing so! It works as well as described and i'm glad to have purchased my own Pumice Stone! I haven't had any problems with it so far, and have made sure to keep it clean and dried as instructed! It's definitely a quality product that i'd recommend anybody that has foot callus problems as it definitely eases things dramatically!
customer_reviews.author: A Satisfied Customer!

customer_reviews.title: but it was perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a very substantial and effective pumice. It might be too abrasive for some people, but it was perfect for me. I would caution people with very sensitive feet against using it, given its abrasiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

product_meta.title: Natural Earth Lava Pumice Stone for Foot Callus by Zenda Naturals - Premium Callus Remover for Feet and Hands - Pedicure Tools, Exfoliation to Remove Dead Skin - Natural Foot File
product_meta.description:
Your Search for the PERFECT pumice stone is FINALLY Over!

Get rid of your calluses TODAY!

 - Are you sick of dealing with poor quality pumice stones that can NEVER seem to get the job done? 
- Do you have trouble finding a good callus remover that lasts longer than a few months? 
- Are you annoyed of dealing with second-rate pumice stones? 

Introducing Your Very Own Zenda Naturals Pumice Stone to the Rescue!

 - The high quality natural earth lava stone helps you remove your foot calluses with ease! 

 - We back all our products with a 60-Day Money Back Guarantee! If you don't absolutely LOVE your Zenda Naturals pumice stone, just return it, and we will refund every penny.

 - Don't wait until the next callus-removing emergency comes up. We cannot guarantee this Special Pricing, so Order Now!
feature_bullets: NATURAL EARTH-FORMED VOLCANIC LAVA PUMICE STONES – Free yourself from the harmful toxins of synthetic pumice stones and treat your feet to the safe, naturally occurring lava stones and keep you feet feeling smooth!
MUST-HAVE STONE FOR PERFECT PEDICURES – Renew your feet with the exfoliating power of this natural pumice stone that helps remove stains, corns and calluses to give your feet a healthy glow!

HEALTHY FEET ARE HAPPY FEET – Enjoy a spa-like experience from the comfort of your home. Remove your calluses, corns and dead skin from your feet and bring back the smooth confidence of your feet! Enjoy the silky soft feel of your heels after each use.

YOUR STONE IS UNIQUE FROM OTHERS – Every stone has a different size, shape and color. Why? These are truly naturally occurring stones that we have hand-picked from the earth to ensure that these stones are not changed by synthetic ingredients.
ERGONOMIC DESIGN MAKES IT EASY TO HANDLE AND USE – Your pumice stone fits easily in your hand, ensuring your exfoliating routine is made as easy as possible.
